text: Gigi Hadid has come up with many stellar skinny - jean outfits over the years and started plenty of trends in the process, so we're always eager to see what she's going to put together next. And this week in New York, she didn't disappoint. Hadid's light - wash Frame jeans and white T - shirt, which she paired with an $ 89 Storets jacket in bright pink, certainly made for a fun summer skinny - jean outfit, but it was the small detail on her feet that really gave us something to talk about.
